name: ToolbarItemPlacement
desc: A structure that defines the placement of a toolbar item.

items.name: static let automatic: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The system places the item automatically, depending on many factors including the platform, size class, or presence of other items.

items.name: static let principal: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The system places the item in the principal item section.

items.name: static let status: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item represents a change in status for the current context.

items.name: static let primaryAction: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item represents a primary action.

items.name: static let confirmationAction: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item represents a confirmation action for a modal interface.

items.name: static let cancellationAction: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item represents a cancellation action for a modal interface.

items.name: static let destructiveAction: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item represents a destructive action for a modal interface.

items.name: static let navigation: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item represents a navigation action.

items.name: static let navigationBarLeading: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: Places the item in the leading edge of the navigation bar.

items.name: static let navigationBarTrailing: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: Places the item in the trailing edge of the navigation bar.

items.name: static let keyboard: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: The item is placed in the keyboard section.

items.name: static let bottomBar: ToolbarItemPlacement
items.desc: Places the item in the bottom toolbar.
